test-case.name: Verify if agent is able to transfer twitter chat via "Transfer chat" button

failure.message: AssertionError: Transfer notes are not visible. Please see the screenshot expected [true] but found [false]
failure.stack-trace: java.lang.AssertionError: Transfer notes are not visible.
